About DICOMNEXT

DICOMNEXT is a lightweight, full-fledged, fast DICOM viewer.

User Interface

DICOMNEXT sports an innovative HTML5 user interface and relies on Canvas and WebGL for rendering. It has been carefully designed for delivering a smooth, snappy experience on any dataset.

PACS

DICOMNEXT can connect to a Picture Archiving and Communication System (PACS) and access studies on an institutional archive for visualization and measurement.

Multi Platform

DICOMNEXT runs on MS Windows, Mac OS X and Linux. Installation is a breeze.

DICOMNEXT features

Image interactions

Regions of Interest

Full screen and customizable viewer

Multi-planar reformatting

Cross-reference lines

Import images from local disks or PACS

Image interactions

Fluid zooming, panning and window/level control. Preset window/level settings for Computed Tomography.

Region of Interest

ROIs and measurements, such as segment lengths, fiducial points and text annotations.

Full screen and customizable viewer

Multiple series on screen can be arranged in a user-defined range of layouts.

Multi-planar reformatting

Visualization of series in coronal, sagittal, axial or user-defined, multi-planar orientation.

Cross-reference lines

Display of cross-reference lines to easily locate the same area on series in multiple orientations.

Import images from local disk or PACS.

Import images from a hard drive or CD/DVD disks. The application provides a safe connection to a PACS system. Query/retrieve and push services are available.
